title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from a table are displayed in a different format in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. The actual format of the datetime values is not consistent.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Retrieve datetime values from a table. 2. Display these values in a dynamic text item and a data/text item. 3. Verify that the format of the datetime values is different between the two items.
